comments:
Description:
Error occurs when parsing a flat file with invalid column name[0701]

Build number: 
2.2.0.v20070125-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1, Modify a flatfile's column name: insert a comma such as UserName -> User,Name
2, Parse it with flat file data set

Expected result:
"Invalid flatfile format" message occurs 

Actual result:
Error log occurs
Error log:
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4
at org.eclipse.datatools.connectivity.oda.flatfile.ResultSetMetaData.trimMetaDataStrings(ResultSetMetaData.java:65)
at org.eclipse.datatools.connectivity.oda.flatfile.ResultSetMetaData.<init>(ResultSetMetaData.java:49)
at org.eclipse.datatools.connectivity.oda.flatfile.FlatFileQuery.prepareMetaData(FlatFileQuery.java:1003)
at org.eclipse.datatools.connectivity.oda.flatfile.FlatFileQuery.prepare(FlatFileQuery.java:152)
at org.eclipse.datatools.connectivity.oda.flatfile.ui.wizards.FileSelectionWizardPage.getResultSetMetaData(FileSelectionWizardPage.java:1128)
at org.eclipse.datatools.connectivity.oda.flatfile.ui.wizards.FileSelectionWizardPage.getQueryColumnsInfo(FileSelectionWizardPage.java:956)
at org.eclipse.datatools.connectivity.oda.flatfile.ui.wizards.FileSelectionWizardPage.getFileColumnNames(FileSelectionWizardPage.java:926)
at org.eclipse.datatools.connectivity.oda.flatfile.ui.wizards.FileSelectionWizardPage.selectionChanged(FileSelectionWizardPage.java:814)
